etymology.description: Depicts a piece of flesh or meat with stripes representing texture.
etymology.interpretation: The character 肉(ròu, "flesh") depicts a piece of meat, meant to evoke the concept of flesh through its visual resemblance to a striped or sectioned piece of meat.

examples.chinese: 我喜欢吃肉(我喜歡吃肉)。
这块肉很鲜美(這塊肉很鮮美)，营养丰富(營養豐富)。
examples.pinyin: Zhè kuài ròu hěn xiānměi, yíngyǎng fēngfù.
examples.english: This piece of meat is very fresh and delicious, and it is nutritious.
